weekly_top_story.headline: Typhoon Matmo makes landfall in Southern China with significant evacuations
weekly_top_story.summary: Typhoon Matmo struck Guangdong Province prompting the evacuation of nearly 370,000 people and large-scale safety measures, highlighting increasing global weather volatility and disaster preparedness challenges.

stories.headline: Israel intercepts flotilla heading to Gaza, taking custody of over 450 international activists
stories.summary: Israeli naval forces intercepted about 40 aid boats near Gaza, securing the safety of over 450 activists amid ongoing regional tensions, reflecting complexities in humanitarian efforts.

stories.headline: Continuous rainfall causes landslides in Eastern Nepal, with major activity in Ilam district
stories.summary: Persistent heavy rain led to multiple landslides in Eastern Nepal, especially Ilam district, prompting coordinated rescue and relief efforts to ensure safety.

stories.headline: Air India flight to UK grounded after emergency engine deployment shortly after takeoff
stories.summary: An Air India flight bound for the UK was grounded following an emergency engine issue just after takeoff, raising important aviation safety concerns.
